page.title: 02 THE KNOLL (CONT.)
page.content: If you looked hard enough you could see the traffic on the{A49}on the other side of our Domesday area. We could see many buildings, mainly farm buildings, some of them were{derelict. If you looked carefully you could see the railway line and the bridges that it goes under. The line goes from Hereford to{Shrewsbury.}On the top of the Knoll you could smell silage, sheep and fresh air. It was cold and windy, some of us were nearly blown off the top but it was a great feeling because you could see for miles. We could hear the traffic but the cars looked very small. On the way down it started to rain so we ran someone fell down but he was alright, it was great running down from the top to the gate at the bottom.
